mapper.select: select users_id, photo_package_image, photo_package_code, photo_package_title, package_cart_package_code, package_cart_price, orders_package_quantity, orders_day, orders_paytype, (package_cart_price*orders_package_quantity) total from photo_package p, package_cart c, package_orders o, users u where o.package_cart_ono=c.package_cart_no and c.package_cart_package_code=p.photo_package_code and u.users_id=c.package_cart_id and users_id=#{users_id} order by orders_day desc

select users_id, lend_costume_image, lend_costume_code,lend_costume_name, costume_cart_costume_code, costume_cart_price, orders_costume_quantity, orders_day, orders_paytype, (costume_cart_price*orders_costume_quantity) total from lend_costume l, costume_cart c, costume_orders o, users u where o.costume_cart_ono=c.costume_cart_no and c.costume_cart_costume_code=l.lend_costume_code and u.users_id=c.costume_cart_id and users_id=#{users_id} order by orders_day desc
select users_point from users where users_id=#{users_id}
mapper.insert: insert into package_orders(package_cart_ono, orders_package_quantity, orders_day, orders_paytype) values(#{package_cart_no}, #{orders_package_quantity}, now(), #{orders_paytype})
insert into costume_orders(costume_cart_ono, orders_costume_quantity, orders_day, orders_paytype) values(#{costume_cart_no}, #{orders_costume_quantity}, now(), #{orders_paytype})
